# isHidden

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the current leaderboard isn’t visible in Game Center views.

## Declaration

```swift
var isHidden: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

You can still submit scores to a hidden leaderboard.
title: isHidden
